t: AMAZON CLICK-THROUGH RATE: TEN WAYS TO IMPROVE CTR - BRAND BUILDER UNIVERSITY
s: July 9, 2024 - Click-through rate (CTR) is a metric that measures how often users click on a particular link or advert. In the context of selling on Amazon, CTR is a measure of how often shoppers who see your product listing on a search results page click through to your product detail page.
